prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with striking yellow fur and a lightning bolt tail.
Imagine a mischievous little creature with oversized ears and a penchant for stealing food.
Design a Pokemon that blends into urban environments, with shades of gray and a sleek body.
Generate a fluffy creature with a bushy tail and bright orange accents, perfect for a forest setting.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small mammal, with a playful personality and a knack for scavenging.
Make a tiny Pokemon that thrives in urban jungles, with a mix of brown and beige fur.
Give me a whimsical design of a creature that can fit in your pocket, with adorable whiskers and big eyes.
